text:
Okay, it's lunchtime now!
Everyone, take a break and refresh yourselves!

Hello!
Are you exploring too, Mikoto-san?

……No,
I was just thinking about the lesson earlier.

Even someone as perfect as Mikoto-san
has things to think about… Amazing!

……But, because I was thinking while walking,
I ended up coming this far.

Yeah,
isn't this place quite far from the training camp?

It's not that far! We promised to
explore until we could see the buildings!

But, we should probably head back soon.
We have afternoon lessons too.

……If it's okay with you,
could you guide me back?
